Duties & Functions

1. Formulation, implementation, monitoring and evaluation of policies, programmes and projects, in relation to the subject of water supply, and those subjects that come under the purview of Departments, Statutory Institutions and Public Corporations listed in Column II based on the national policies implemented by the government.
